Bladedancer.name: Bladedancer
stats: 15% more dodge rating (multiplicative with other modifiers)

Marksman.name: Marksman
stats: Bow Mastery: Using a bow attack grants 5% increased attack speed. Can stack 5 times. All stacks fall off after if you have not used a bow attack recently.
Bow Mastery: 50% increased damage while using a bow

Rogue-0.name: Steady Hand
reminderText: Each point of Dexterity adds 4 dodge rating and improves skills that rely on the skillfull handling of weapons, such as Flurry and Shurikens.

Rogue-2.name: Flow
description: Gain a stack of {Flow} whenever you use a unique skill. Using a fourth unique skill consumes all stacks causing the skill to deal greatly increased damage. Stacks fall off after 4 seconds of not using a new unique skill.
reminderText: Flow only triggers when you actively use a skill.

Rogue-3.name: Draining Arrows
description: You have increased bow attack speed and when you use a bow attack and hit at least one enemy you regain health.

Rogue-4.name: Spell Breaker
description: You have a chance to parry hits, and increased mana regeneration.

Rogue-6.name: Swift Assassin
description: Your melee, throwing, and bow attacks have increased attack speed and deal additional physical damage.

Rogue-7.name: Evasion
description: You take less damage while moving (multiplicative with other modifiers) and have increased dodge rating.

Rogue-8.name: Agility
stats: 0.2% Increased Damage per 1% Increased Movement Speed
description: You have a chance to gain {Haste} for one second on hit and deal increased damage based on your increased movement speed.

Rogue-9.name: Dodge and Parry
description: You have additional dodge rating and a chance to receieve a {Glancing Blow} when hit.
reminderText: Glancing Blows deal 35% less damage.

Rogue-10.name: Twin Blade
stats: +20% Attack And Cast Speed While Dual Wielding
description: You can dual wield melee weapons by equipping a sword or dagger in your off hand. While dual wielding, you have increased attack and cast speed, but take more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

Rogue-11.name: Duelist
stats: 4% Increased Dodge Rating while Dual Wielding

Rogue-12.name: Lethal Cadence
description: Every third melee, throwing, or bow attack deals increased damage.

Rogue-13.name: Poison Tipped
description: You have a chance to poison on hit while you have a dagger or bow equipped.

Rogue-14.name: Sapping Strikes
description: When you use a skill that costs zero mana and hit an enemy you regain health and mana.

Rogue-15.name: Critical Precision
stats: 8% Increased Critical Strike Chance per Sword
8% Increased Critical Strike Chance per Dagger
12% Increased Critical Strike Chance with a Bow
description: You have increased critical strike chance per sword, bow, or dagger you have equipped.

Rogue-16.name: Disembowel
description: Every third non-channelling melee, throwing, or bow attack also inflicts bleed.

Rogue-17.name: Coated Blades
description: When you directly use a melee or bow attack that costs mana, it consumes additional mana to deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

Rogue-18.name: Thiefguard
description: You have additional health and whenever you receive a glancing blow you recover health.

Rogue-21.name: Focus Fire
description: You have additional Dexterity and when you hit a boss or rare enemy you reduce its dodge rating for 8 seconds.

Rogue-22.name: Concentration
description: By default you have {Concentration} which grants you more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers). If you are hit by an enemy within 4m you lose concentration for 4 seconds. Subsequent hits do not reset the cooldown.

Rogue-23.name: Missile Mastery
description: You have increased bow and throwing attack damage and you have a chance to shred armour on hit.

Rogue-24.name: Elemental Arrows
description: If you have a bow equipped you gain 1 {Elemental Arrow} per second, up to a maximum of 3. Using a bow attack expends an Elemental Arrow to deal additional bow fire damage and bow lightning damage.

Rogue-25.name: Wound Maker
description: You have a chance to inflict Critical Vulnerability on hit.

Rogue-26.name: Prolonged Demise
stats: +7% Damage Over Time while wielding a Bow
description: You take less damage over time (multiplicative with other modifiers). While wielding a bow you deal increased damage over time.

Rogue-27.name: Storm Fletcher
description: If you have a bow equipped you deal increased elemental damage and gain {Elemental Arrows} more frequently.

Rogue-29.name: Siege Quiver
description: You can hold additional {Elemental Arrows} and you gain ward per {Elemental Arrow} when you use them.

Rogue-30.name: Heightened Senses
description: You have a chance to avoid critical strikes and your critical strikes with bow attacks deal more damage.

Rogue-31.name: Reflection
notScalingStats: 10% Less Hit Damage Taken With Concentration

Rogue-32.name: Elemental Barrage
stats: +1 Elemental Arrow consumed per bow attack
notScalingStats: 200% Shock and Ignite chance when consuming 3 Arrows
description: You can consume [1] additional {Elemental Arrow} with each bow attack. If you consume 3 arrows with a single attack it has 200% additional shock and ignite chance

Rogue-33.name: Arrow Storm
stats: 10% Increased Bow Attack Speed with Arrow Storm
description: When you use a bow attack you gain {Arrow Storm} which increases your bow attack speed for 3 seconds. You can only gain Arrow Storm once every 10 seconds.

Rogue-35.name: Fire and Steel
stats: 25% Increased Elemental Damage with Elemental Arrow
Non-Elemental Bow Attacks Generate Elemental Arrows
Only Elemental Bow Attacks Consume Elemental Arrows
description: Non-elemental bow attacks cannot consume {Elemental Arrows}, but instead generate an Elemental Arrow on use. Consuming an Elemental Arrow also increases the elemental damage of the attack that consumes them.

Rogue-36.name: Covering Fire
description: When you proc {Arrowstorm} you gain stacks of {Silver Shroud}. Silver Shroud is a buff that gives you 100% chance to dodge the next hit. Dodging a hit with Silver Shroud consumes all stacks, granting you 100 ward per stack.
reminderText: Ward is an overshield shield that protects your health. It has no maximum and decays over time.

Rogue-37.name: Sniper's Gambit
stats: 1% Increased damage taken from nearby enemies

Rogue-38.name: Poison Tipped Arrows
description: You have additional poison penetration and bow attacks have additional chance to poison on hit.

Rogue-39.name: Sharpshooter
description: Chance to gain a stack of Sharpshooter when you hit an enemy based on your how far you are from that enemy, up to a maximum at 10m. Each stack of Sharpshooter increases bow damage and lasts 8 seconds.

Rogue-40.name: Ethereal Arrows
description: You have increased mana and mana regen and your bow attacks deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) equal to a portion of their mana cost.

Rogue-41.name: Barrage of Pain
description: Adds {Barrage of Pain} to your Marksman Passive, Bow Mastery. You gain a stack and refresh all existing stacks of Bow Mastery by using a bow attack and hitting at least one enemy.
reminderText: Bow Mastery still increases bow attack speed

Rogue-42.name: Rain of Arrows
description: Adds a chance to cause a {Rain of Arrows} to descend upon your target when you proc {Arrow Storm}. Rain of Arrows is a physical bow attack that hits all enemies in an area around the target.
reminderText: Rain of Arrows is unrelated to the active skill Hail of Arrows and is not affected by its tree.

Rogue-43.name: Mana Warp
description: When you use a skill that costs zero mana and hit an enemy you regain mana, but bow attacks cost more mana.

Rogue-44.name: Death from Afar
stats: 4% Increased Stun Chance per stack of Sharpshooter
4% Armour Shred Chance per stack of Sharpshooter
description: Each stack of Sharpshooter also increases stun chance and adds a chance to shred armour on hit

Rogue-46.name: Perfect Aim
description: Each stack of Bow Mastery with {Barrage of Pain} also grants additional critical strike multiplier and health gained on crit.

Rogue-50.name: Cloak of Shadows
description: You have additional dexterity and you have a chance to receive a {Glancing Blow} when hit.
reminderText: Glancing Blows deal 35% less damage.

Rogue-52.name: Once
description: You deal additional physical damage with melee and throwing attacks, and if you have been hit recently have additional dodge rating.

Rogue-53.name: Skiasynthesis
notScalingStats: 50% Shadow Daggers Damage to Rares and Bosses
description: When you create a shadow you regain health and skills used by shadows deal increased damage.

Rogue-54.name: Rhythm
description: Generating a stack of {Flow} increases your melee and throwing attack speed for a short duration. This buff can stack.

Rogue-55.name: Scarlet Stream
description: You deal increased physical damage and have a chance to inflict bleed on hit with melee and throwing attacks.

Rogue-56.name: Shroud of Dusk
stats: 4% Chance to gain Dusk Shroud when hit
description: You have additional health and you have a chance to gain a stack of {Dusk Shroud} when hit. Each stack of Dusk Shroud adds 50 dodge rating and 5% chance to receive a {Glancing Blow} when hit.
reminderText: Glancing Blows deal 35% less damage.

Rogue-57.name: Pulse
notScalingStats: 5 Unique Skills Required to Consume Flow
description: {Flow} is consumed when you use a 5th unique skill rather than a 4th, but the skill that consumes flow has much higher critical strike chance and bleed chance.

Rogue-58.name: Veil of Night
description: You have increased melee attack speed. When you use a melee attack and hit at least one enemy you have a chance to gain a stack of {Dusk Shroud}. Each stack of Dusk Shroud adds 50 dodge rating and 5% chance to receive a {Glancing Blow} when hit.
reminderText: Glancing Blows deal 35% less damage.

Rogue-59.name: Tempo
stats: 10% Increased Melee Damage when Generating or Consuming Flow
+5% Melee Crit Multiplier when Generating or Consuming Flow
description: Skills that generate or consume {Flow} deal increased melee damage and have additional melee critical strike multiplier.

Rogue-60.name: Crimson Shroud
notScalingStats: 50% Bleed Chance per Stack of Crimson Shroud
-5% Damage over Time Taken per Stack of Crimson Shroud
description: When you directly use a melee or throwing attack and hit at least one enemy you have a chance to gain a stack of {Crimson Shroud} for 4 seconds. Crimson Shroud grants chance to inflict bleed on hit and less damage over time taken (multiplicative with other modifiers).

Rogue-61.name: Apostacy
description: Your dodge chance is added as twice as much chance to receive a glancing blow, but you cannot dodge.
reminderText:
Does not prevent dodging with {Silver Shroud}.
Glancing Blows deal 35% less damage.

Rogue-62.name: Flash of Steel
notScalingStats: 12% Increased Melee Attack Speed while Dual Wielding
12% Increased Throwing Attack Speed while Dual Wielding

Rogue-63.name: Blood Dance
stats: 0.5% Damage Leeched as Health from Damage Over Time
description: You leech a portion of melee damage as health, and a portion of your damage over time as health.

Rogue-64.name: Asuvon's Pact
stats: 15% Increased Damage while at full health

Rogue-65.name: Weapons of Choice
stats: 20% Increased Crit Chance with a Sword and Dagger
+20% Bleed Chance with an Axe and a Sword
2% Physical Damage Leeched as Health with an Axe and Dagger
20% Increased Stun Duration with a Mace and Sword
+20% Frailty Chance with a Mace and Dagger
description: You gain a bonus while dual wielding depending on your weapon combination.

Rogue-66.name: Argent Veil
stats: 1 Stacks of Silver Shroud when you drop below high health
description:
When damage taken from enemies puts you below 70% health you gain stacks of {Silver Shroud}. Silver Shroud is a buff that gives you 100% chance to dodge the next hit. Dodging a hit with Silver Shroud consumes all stacks, granting you 100 ward per stack.

This node's effect has a 15 second cooldown, but the cooldown does not prevent you from gaining Silver Shroud from other sources.
reminderText: Ward is an overshield shield that protects your health. It has no maximum and decays over time.

Rogue-67.name: Perfection
notScalingStats: 10% Increased Damage per Stack of Perfection
description: When you use a melee attack and hit at least one enemy you gain a stack of Perfection. When you receive a hit you lose all stacks. Each stack of perfection increases your damage.

Rogue-68.name: Critical Eye
description: You have increased critical strike chance and you have a chance to inflict {Critical Vulnerability} on hit.
reminderText: Critical Vulnerability is a stacking ailment that adds a 5% additional chance to be crit and reduces critical strike avoidance by 10%.

Rogue-69.name: Cloaked Reaper
stats: 1 Health Gained per Stack of Shroud
description: You have additional health. When you kill an enemy or hit a rare or boss enemy, you regain health for each stack of any Shroud on you.
reminderText: Shrouds include {Dusk Shroud}, {Crimson Shroud}, and {Silver Shroud}.

Rogue-70.name: Confidence
stats: +10 Dodge Rating per Stack of Perfection

Rogue-71.name: Death's Door
stats: -3% Damage Taken While At Low Health
+10% Crit Multi While At Low Health
description:
While at low health you take less damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and you have additional critical strike multiplier.

Additionally, when damage leaves you at low health you gain these benefits for 5 seconds if you aren't already at low health.

Rogue-72.name: Hooked Blades
description: Your hits have a chance to shred armour and armour shred you apply is more effective.

Rogue-73.name: All In
stats: 5% Less Damage Dealt by Non-critical Hits
description: You have a higher critical strike multiplier, but you deal less damage with non-critical hits and damage over time (multiplicative with other modifiers).

Rogue-74.name: Shadow Master
description: You can have an additional shadow. Skills used by shadows deal increased damage.
reminderText: You can have a maximum of 3 shadows at once by default.

Rogue-75.name: Exuberance
notScalingStats: 2 Stacks of Perfection per Melee Attack at Full Health

Rogue-76.name: Barbed Arrows
stats: 5% Chance to inflict Bleed on Bow Hit

Rogue-78.name: Raptor's Wings
description:
You have a chance to gain haste for 2 seconds when you or your {Falcon} hits an enemy.

Additionally, you deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) while you have haste.

Rogue-80.name: Crimson Skies
description: You have a chance to gain a stack of {Crimson Shroud} when your {Falcon} or {Ballistas} hit an enemy.

Rogue-82.name: Outlander's Tenacity
stats: 3% Maximum Health Gained As Endurance Threshold
description: You have additional dodge rating and you gain a portion of your maximum health as endurance threshold if you have not been hit recently.

Rogue-83.name: Expert Duelist
notScalingStats: 10% Increased Melee Attack Speed With 2h Sword
+2% Fire Penetration Per Int With Staff
+1 Melee Damage Per 10 Dex With Spear

Rogue-85.name: Ranger's Mark
description: You deal increased damage while wielding a bow and your bow hits have a chance to grant your {Falcon} additional melee damage for 4 seconds. This has no stack limit.

Rogue-89.name: Sharpest Point
notScalingStats: 30% Increased Flurry Attack Speed With Spear
description: You deal increased damage and have an additional chance to inflict bleed while wielding a spear.

Rogue-90.name: Avian Hurl
notScalingStats: 50% Added Throwing Damage Conversion To Falcon

Rogue-91.name: Blast Radius
stats: 5% Increased Area for Minion Area Skills
description: Your area skills and your minions' area skills deal damage in a larger area.
reminderText: Traps include: {Explosive Trap}, {Net Trap} and {Acid Trap}.

Rogue-93.name: Coordinated Fade
description: When you use a certain ability on your bar, you gain 3 stacks of Silver Shroud. This effect has a 10 second cooldown.

Rogue-94.name: Relentless Talons
notScalingStats: 1 Health Gain on Falcon Hit Per 3 Dex

Rogue-95.name: Deflect and Weave
stats: 3 Health On Block Or Glancing Blow
description: You have additional block and a chance to receive a glancing blow. Additionally, you regain health whenever you block or recieve a glancing blow.

Rogue-97.name: Intuitive Connection
description:
{Falcon Strikes} and {Dive Bomb} are now instant cast.

Additionally, {Falcon Strikes} and {Dive Bomb} have a longer cooldown.

Rogue-98.name: Final Souvenir
stats: 5% Chance To Throw Caltrops On Dodge
description:
You have additional dodge rating and you now have a chance to drop {Caltrops} around you when you dodge and there is an enemy within 4 meters of you.

This effect has a 2 second cooldown.

Rogue-102.name: Stymphalian Feathers
description: You have additional armor per point of Dexterity.

Rogue-103.name: Expediency
description: Haste on you has increased effect and you gain haste for a short duration whenever you use a potion.

Rogue-104.name: Poise
notScalingStats: Double Glancing Blow Chance If Not Hit

Rogue-105.name: Tailwind
notScalingStats: Double Effects With Recent Falcon Hit
description:
You take less damage while moving. Additionally, you have increased movement speed and dodge rating.

These effects are doubled if your {Falcon} has hit an enemy recently.

Rogue-106.name: Finesse Them
notScalingStats: +1% Minion Critical Multiplier per 3% Crit Avoidance
description:
You regain health when you or your minions crits an enemy.

You have additional critical strike avoidance.

aa989-2.name: Avian Hunter
description: Aerial Assault deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and has a shorter cooldown.

aa989-3.name: Featherstorm
description: After the initial {Wing Burst} your Falcon continues releasing {Featherstorm} at the target location for 5 seconds.

aa989-4.name: Domain of the Huntress
stats: +1 Dodge Rating per Dex inside Feather Storm
description:
{Featherstorm} now has a chance to slow enemies inside its area each second. 

Additionally, you and your allies have additional dodge rating while inside the area.

aa989-5.name: Shaded Wingspan
description: If there is a boss or rare enemy nearby, Aerial Assault now also creates a {Shadow Falcon} to use {Featherstorm} against it.

aa989-6.name: Storm on the Horizon
description:
Aerial Assault no longer moves you. Additionally, it deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and it no longer has a minimum range.

Aerial Assault loses its {Traversal} tag.

aa989-7.name: Razorblade Plume
stats: +2% Feather Storm Damage Bonus Per Second
description: {Featherstorm} lasts longer and deals more direct damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per second it has been active.
reminderText: Direct damage modifiers do not affect damage of ailments from Featherstorm.

aa989-8.name: Darkwing Fall
description: {Featherstorm} now has a chance each second to drop a {Black Arrow}.

aa989-9.name: Pitohui
description:
{Featherstorms'} base physical damage over time is converted to poison. Consequently this damage scales with increases to poison damage, but not increases to physical damage.

A portion of your global poison chance on hit now applies as poison chance per second for {Featherstorm}.

Swaps {Featherstorms'} {Physical} tag for a {Poison} tag.

aa989-10.name: Skyward Swoop
stats: 6% Remaining Cooldown Recovered On Falcon Hit
description: A portion of Aerial Assault's cooldown is recovered when your Falcon hits an enemy. This effect can occur a limited number of times per 3 seconds.

aa989-11.name: Treacherous Pursuit
description: Using Aerial Assault now also drops {Caltrops} at your location.

aa989-12.name: Vengeful Nails
description: {Caltrops} from all sources have a chance to slow on hit and deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

aa989-13.name: Spikefield
description: You now drop additional {Caltrops} halfway through Aerial Assault's movement if you traveled at least 6 meters.

aa989-14.name: Rending Barbs
stats: +1% Falcon Bleed Chance per 10 Dex with Buff
description:
{Caltrops'} hits from all sources have a chance to cause enemies to bleed. 

Additionally, when an enemy walks over your {Caltrops} your Falcon's hits gain additional bleed chance scaling with your Dexterity for 4 seconds. This effect can occur a limited number of times per 4 seconds.

aa989-15.name: Refreshing Resolve
description: Directly using Aerial Assault recovers a portion of your missing mana.

aa989-16.name: Coordinated Assault
description: Directly using Aerial Assault recovers a portion of the remaining cooldown of {Falconry} and {Dive Bomb} per 10 maximum mana you have.

aa989-17.name: Healing Gust
description: Directly using Aerial Assault recovers a portion of your missing health.

aa989-18.name: Gustborne Guard
description: Convert the health gain from the {Healing Gust} node to ward at half the effect.

aa989-19.name: Aerial Prowess
description:
For the next 8 seconds after using Aerial Assault, critical strikes dealt by you or your {Falcon} grant you a stack of {Aerial Prowess} up to a maximum.

When you next use Aerial Assault, it consumes all stacks to restore health per stack and deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per stack.

aa989-20.name: Wind Rider
description:
You have more global dodge rating (multiplicative with other modifiers) while traveling with Aerial Assault.

Additionally, each hit you dodge while traveling grants you a stack of {Aerial Prowess}.

aa989-21.name: Torrent of Talons
description: Aerial Assault now has a chance to grant you {Aerial Prowess} stacks on non-critical strikes and when you kill an enemy.

aa989-22.name: Falcon's Havoc
description: Consuming stacks of {Aerial Assault} now grants you {Haste} and Frenzy for a short duration per stack consumed.

aa989-23.name: Terrorwings
stats: Aerial Prowess applies to other Abilities
description: Directly using {Ballista,} {Explosive Trap}, or {Dive Bomb} now also consumes your stacks of {Aerial Prowess}, applying the damage bonus to the ability that consumed them.

aa989-25.name: Covering Fire
description: The {Wing Burst's} hits apply frailty.

aa989-26.name: Tactician
description: After landing, all your active {Ballistas} prioritize targets around you, deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per Intelligence, and gain increased attack speed.

aa989-27.name: Predator's Cascade
description: The {Wing Burst} deals damage in a larger area.
reminderText: This effect also applies to {Featherstorm}.

aa989-28.name: Ambush
description: The {Wing Burst} deals more direct damage to enemies on high health.
reminderText:
Direct damage modifiers do not affect damage of ailments and subskills from Aerial Assault.

This direct damage modifier does affect {Featherstorm}.

aa989-29.name: Slayer of big Prey
stats: Damage bonus always applies to bosses and rares
description: The damage bonus from {Ambush} always applies against bosses and rare enemies, regardless of their health.

aa989-30.name: Umbral Remnants
stats: Shadow Falcon on Feather Burst Kill
description: When the {Wing Burst} kills an enemy and you have 3 or fewer active {Shadows}, it creates a {Shadow} at that enemy's location.
reminderText: This effect also applies to {Featherstorm}.

aa989-31.name: Projectile Training
description: A portion of your added, increased, and more throwing damage modifiers now apply to the {Wing Burst}.
reminderText: This effect also applies to {Featherstorm}.

aa989-32.name: Twilight Strike
description: The {Wing Burst} now also includes a few {Umbral Blades} that your Falcon throws for you.

aa989-33.name: Plumed Daggers
description: The {Umbral Blades'} hits from the {Twilight Strike} node now shred enemy armor.

aacfl-2.name: Corrosive
description: Acid Flask deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

aacfl-3.name: Elixir of Speed
description: Acid Flask has a chance to grant {Haste} on use for a short duration.

aacfl-4.name: Toxic Salvo
description:
When you directly use Acid Flask, you now throw 3 Acid Flasks in a line, but Acid Flask costs more mana.

Enemies can only be hit by one flask per throw.

aacfl-5.name: Barrage
description: When you directly use Acid Flask, you now throw Acid Flasks in a fan in front of you instead of a line. Flasks travel faster.

aacfl-6.name: Tempered Glass
description: Acid Flask has a chance to shred enemy armor.

aacfl-7.name: Poison Pools
description:
Acid Flask leaves behind a {Poison Pool} for 4 seconds that poison enemies that stand in it and adds a 2 second cooldown per flask thrown.

You can have a maximum of 4 {Poison Pools} active at once.
reminderText:
{Poison Pool} applies a stack of poison to enemies standing in it each second.
This effect can be converted to Frostbite if Acid Flask is converted to cold.

aacfl-8.name: Hydrochloric Acid
description: You have a chance to poison enemies while standing in your {Poison Pools}.

aacfl-9.name: Lingering Toxicity
description: {Poison Pools} last longer.
reminderText: {Poison Pool} applies a stack of poison to enemies standing in it each second.

aacfl-10.name: Explosive Flask
stats: No Poison Chance or Poison Pools
description:
Acid Flask's base damage is converted to fire damage and its hits deal significantly more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers). Consequently this damage scales with increases to fire damage, but not increases to physical damage.

Acid Flask can no longer apply poison or create poison pools.

aacfl-11.name: Smoulder
description: Converts Armor Shred from all sources that Acid Flask would apply to Fire Resistance Shred.

aacfl-12.name: Cluster Bomb
description: When Acid Flask is thrown directly it causes 3 smaller explosions around the impact location dealing fire damage on hit, but it costs more mana.

aacfl-13.name: Blinding Mixture
description: Acid Flask has a chance to blind enemies hit for 4 seconds.

aacfl-14.name: Contamination
description: Acid Flask has a chance to shred enemy poison resistance on hit.
reminderText: This effect can be converted to cold resistance shred chance if Acid Flask is converted to cold.

aacfl-15.name: Caustic Concoction
description: Acid Flask has additional chance to poison enemies on hit.
reminderText: This effect can be converted to frostbite chance if Acid Flask is converted to cold.

aacfl-16.name: Debilitate
description: Acid Flask has a chance to apply {Frailty} to enemies hit, causing them to deal less damage.

aacfl-17.name: Lasting Sickness
description: Acid Flask has increased poison duration.
reminderText: This effect can be converted to Frostbite duration if Acid Flask is converted to cold.

aacfl-18.name: Quick Draw
description: Acid Flask has increased throwing speed.

aacfl-19.name: Castigate
stats: +10% Chance to Drop Flask When Hit
description:
You have a chance to drop an Acid Flask at your feet when an enemy hits you. 

This effect has a 5 second cooldown.

aacfl-20.name: Alchemical Proficiency
description: Acid Flask costs less mana and deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

aacfl-21.name: Hindering Mixture
description: Acid Flask has a chance to slow enemies on hit. Slow caused by Acid Flask lasts longer.

aacfl-22.name: Firebomb Cocktail
description: Acid Flask deals additional throwing fire damage.

aacfl-23.name: Flammable Concoction
description: Acid Flask has a chance to ignite enemies.

aacfl-24.name: Piercing Debris
description: Acid Flask has increased citical strike chance and critical strikes deal more damage.

aacfl-25.name: Splash Zone
description: Acid Flask deals damage in a larger area.
reminderText: This does not affect {Cluster Bomb}.

aacfl-26.name: Lightweight
description: Acid Flask travels faster.

aacfl-28.name: Knowledge of Immunity
stats: 1% Poison Penetration per 5% Uncapped Poison Resistance
description: Acid Flask penetrates poison resistance based on your own uncapped Poison Resistance
reminderText:
This scales off of uncapped poison resistance, so gaining more poison resistance above the normal 75% cap will continue to increase its effect.

Effects which convert Acid Flask's base damage also convert this penetration.

aacfl-29.name: Amatoxic Pools
description: {Poison Pools} have a chance to inflict enemies with {Efficacious Toxin} each second, causing them to take increased damage over time.

aacfl-30.name: Alchemist's Gift
description:
Acid Flask is now thrown as a trap that starts arming and explodes when enemies walk over it.

You can have a maximum of 6 Acid Flask Traps active at once.

ba1574-0.name: Ballista
description: Summons a ballista that fires fire arrows at nearby enemies.

ba1574-2.name: Efficient Construction
description: Ballista costs significantly less mana, but has a shorter duration.

ba1574-4.name: Bolt Rain
description: Ballista has a chance to shoot extra projectiles.

ba1574-5.name: Armed Construction
description: Ballista now also explodes when it expires or is destroyed. This explosion deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and hits enemies in a larger area based on your Dexterity.

ba1574-6.name: Light Bolts
description: Ballista has more attack speed (multiplicative with other modifiers), but deals less damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

ba1574-7.name: Serrated Edges
description: Ballista has a chance to shred enemy armor.

ba1574-8.name: Twinned Bolts
description: Ballista has a chance to fire twice in quick succession.

ba1574-9.name: Shields Up
description: Ballista now has shields in front of it.

ba1574-10.name: Flaming Shots
description: Ballista bolts are lit on fire dealing additional fire damage and have a chance to ignite enemies.

ba1574-11.name: Rapid Fire
description: Ballista has increased attack speed.

ba1574-12.name: Explosive Delivery
description: Ballista's bolts now explode on hit dealing fire damage in an area, but has less attack speed (multiplicative with other modifiers).

ba1574-13.name: Frigid Barrage
description:
The explosion's base fire damage is converted to cold. Consequently this damage scales with increases to cold damage, but not increases to fire damage. The explosion also has a chance to freeze enemies.

Ignite chance from inside this skill tree is converted to chill chance.
reminderText: The damage added by the {Flaming Shots} node is also converted to cold.

ba1574-14.name: Practical Build
description: Ballista deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and has more attack speed (multiplicative with other modifiers), but has a shorter duration.

ba1574-15.name: Sturdy Foundation
description: Ballista has more health and lasts longer.

ba1574-16.name: Acidulous Mixture
description: Ballista has a chance to slow enemies.

ba1574-17.name: Tainted Ammunition
description:
Hitting your Ballista with {Acid Flask} gives it a chance to poison enemies and more poison damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

If {Acid Flask} damage is converted to fire, this is instead ignite chance and more fire damage.

ba1574-18.name: Agile Engineering
description: Ballista takes less time to place and has increased attack speed based on your Dexterity.

ba1574-19.name: Contaminating Shots
description: Your ailment modifiers also apply to your Ballista, but at a reduced ratio.
reminderText:
Your Ballista will receive your ailment chance, ailment duration, and ailment effect.
If you have 100% chance to inflict bleed on hit, 15% ailment stat ratio would give your Ballista 15% chance to inflict bleed on hit.

ba1574-20.name: Quickload
description: Ballista gains increased attack speed with each hit.

ba1574-21.name: Siege Commander
description: Your Ballistae gain {Frenzy} while you are standing near them.

ba1574-22.name: Shared Enhancements
description: Your damage modifiers also apply to your Ballista, but at a reduced ratio.

ba1574-23.name: Heavy Bolts
description: Ballista deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but has less attack speed (multiplicative with other modifiers).

ba1574-24.name: Wide Protection
description: Ballista shields are wider.

ba1574-25.name: Elixir of Construction
description: Ballista deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) if constructed within 4 seconds of using a potion.

ba1574-26.name: Sharpened Tips
description: Improves Ballista's base critical strike chance.

ba1574-27.name: Perfect Aim
description: Your critical strike chance and critical strike multipliers also apply to your Ballista, but at a reduced ratio.

ba1574-28.name: Bodkin Bolts
description: Ballista bolts pierces enemies (continue through targets they hit).

ba1574-29.name: Harpoon Shot
description: Every 5 seconds Ballista shoots a {Harpoon Shot}, that sticks into an enemy and pulls them towards the Ballista.

ba1574-31.name: Care Package
description: Ballistae which have hit an enemy have a chance to drop a potion when destroyed, based on the time they existed.

ba1574-32.name: Tripwire
description: When you construct a second ballista a tripwire is created between it and the existing ballista. Enemies that cross the tripwire cause both ballistae to explode.

cstri-2.name: Ignition
description: Cinder Strike has a chance to ignite enemies and ignites inflicted by the first attack have increased duration.

cstri-4.name: Soot and Ash
description: Cinder Strike has a chance to blind enemies while using a bow and a chance to apply {Frailty} to enemies while using a melee weapon.

cstri-5.name: Blast Wave
description: Cinder Strike's first attack deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) in a larger area.

cstri-6.name: Overexertion
description: Cinder Strike now only has the first attack and it deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but costs significantly more mana.

cstri-7.name: Eagerness
description: Cinder Strike's second and third attacks have increased attack speed.

cstri-8.name: Pocket Sand
description: Blind chance from all sources is converted to {Critical Vulnerability} chance for Cinder Strike.

cstri-9.name: Cauterize
description: Cinder Strike deals more critical strike damage. This bonus is doubled for the first attack.

cstri-10.name: Tireless
description: Cinder Strike costs less mana.

cstri-11.name: Flame Alchemist
description: When you use Cinder Strike and hit with its first attack it has a chance to throw a {Volatile Flask} at a nearby target.
reminderText: {Volatile Flask} scales with increases to fire and throwing damage.

cstri-12.name: Explosive Impact
description: {Volatile Flask} deals more explosion damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

cstri-13.name: Explosive Lash
description: Cinder Strike has a chance to cause an explosion on kill. This counts as a {Volatile Flask} explosion.

cstri-14.name: Incinerate
description: Cinder Strike hits deals additional fire damage for each ignited enemy you have hit recently up to a maximum.

cstri-15.name: Searing Blows
description: Cinder Strike's first attack has more critical strike chance (multiplicative with other modifiers) per stack of ignite on the target up to a maximum.

cstri-16.name: Fire Walker
stats: +3% Fire Damage Over Time per Dex
description: Cinder Strike deals increased fire damage over time per point of Dexterity.

cstri-17.name: Flammable Toxins
description: Poison chance from all sources is converted to ignite chance for Cinder Strike.

cstri-18.name: Oil Coating
description: If you use and hit at least one enemy with Cinder Strike you are granted {Oil Coating} granting you increased fire damage. This effect can stack and lasts 4 seconds.

cstri-19.name: Combustible
description:
If you have at least 3 stacks of {Oil Coating} you are granted additional fire penetration.

This effect is doubled for ignites inflicted by Cinder Strike.

cstri-20.name: Fire Eater
description: {Oil Coating} is limited to 5 stacks. If you would gain another stack you instead regain health and mana.

cstri-21.name: Elusive
description: You have additional chance to dodge and additional fire resistance per stack of {Oil Coating}.

cstri-22.name: Elemental Vulnerability
description: {Oil Coating} now grants you increased elemental damage rather than just fire damage.

cstri-23.name: Coated Darts
description: {Oil Coating} now also grants additional throwing fire damage.

cstri-24.name: Kindling
description: Cinder Strike has a chance to shred enemy fire resistance.

cstri-25.name: Molten Arsenal
description: If you use and hit at least one enemy with Cinder Strike it consumes 8 mana granting you a {Burning Dagger} that circles you for a second before launching at the nearest enemy.
reminderText: {Burning Dagger} deals fire throwing damage and ignites the enemy.

cstri-26.name: Flaming Fury
description: {Burning Daggers} from all sources deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), and Burning Daggers from {Molten Arsenal} consume less mana.

cstri-27.name: Firebreathing
stats: Burning Daggers Cone On First Attack
description: You now also throw 5 {Burning Daggers} in a cone in front of you on Cinder Strike's first attack.

cstri-28.name: Umbral Conflagration
description: All your {Shadows} now also throw 5 {Burning Daggers} in a cone in front of them when you do. This consumes all active {Shadows}.

cstri-29.name: Inferno
description: Cinder Strike deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers and its hits deal additional fire damage.

dacn33-0.name: Dancing Strikes
description: A series of fast dash attacks.

dacn33-2.name: Slicing
description: Dancing Strikes penetrates enemy physical resistance.

dacn33-3.name: Dark Blades
description: Dancing Strikes inflicts enemies with {Shadow Dagger}.

dacn33-4.name: Grievous Wounds
description: Dancing Strikes has a chance to cause enemies to bleed.

dacn33-5.name: Trickling Cuts
description: You deal more global damage over time (multiplicative with other modifiers) for each time you have used Dancing Strikes recently.
reminderText: Recently refers to the past 4 seconds.

dacn33-6.name: Contaminate
description: All bleed chance is converted to poison chance with Dancing Strikes. Physical penetration from this tree converted to poison penetration.

dacn33-7.name: Majasa's Dagger
description: Dancing Strikes deals more melee damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per poison stacks on the target up to a maximum.

dacn33-8.name: Silent Death
description: Dancing Strikes has a chance to poison enemies, but deals less physical damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

dacn33-9.name: Snake Bites
description: Dancing Strikes hits deal more damage to bleeding and poisoned enemies (multiplicative with other modifiers).

dacn33-10.name: Eluding Steps
description: Dancing Strikes grants you additional dodge rating for a short duration on use.

dacn33-11.name: Nimble
description: Dancing Strikes grants you additional dodge rating per point of Dexterity for a short duration on use.

dacn33-12.name: Underdog
description: Dancing Strikes deals more damage to rare enemies and bosses (multiplicative with other modifiers).

dacn33-13.name: Graceful Arena
notScalingStats: Damage Taken Bonus Doubled For You
description:
Dancing Strikes' third attack creates a {Fighting Arena} for 4 seconds.

While fighting inside the arena, you and your allies deal more damage and take less damage (both multiplicative with other modifiers). The less damage taken is doubled for you.

dacn33-14.name: Lacerating Aura
description: You and allies fighting inside the arena have a high chance to cause enemies to bleed.

dacn33-15.name: Close Combat
description: Dancing Strikes deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) but you travel less far between each attack.

dacn33-16.name: Tenacious Vitae
description: You take less damage over time (multiplicative with other modifiers) for a short duration after using Dancing Strikes.

dacn33-17.name: Resolute Technique
description: {Lethal Mirage} and {Synchronized Strikes} deal increased damage for each time you have used Dancing Strikes recently.
reminderText: Recently refers to the past 4 seconds.

dacn33-18.name: Invigorating Moves
description: Dancing Strikes' third attack heals you if it hits at least one enemy.
reminderText: This is affected by increased healing effectiveness.

dacn33-19.name: Quick Step
description: Dancing Strikes has a chance to grant you {Haste} for 2 seconds on use.

dacn33-20.name: Windmill Ballet
description: Dancing Strikes' second and fourth attack have a chance to throw {Shurikens} in target direction.

dacn33-21.name: Broad Dancing
description: Dancing Strikes deals damage in a larger area.

dacn33-22.name: Cutting Corners
description: Dancing Strikes has a chance to shred enemy armor.

dacn33-23.name: Rhythm
description: When you use Dancing Strikes and hit at least one enemy, you gain a stack of {Rhythm} for a short duration and refresh all existing stacks, granting you global more damage per stack (multiplicative with other modifiers).

dacn33-24.name: Elegance
description: You have increased dodge rating per stack of {Rhythm}.

dacn33-25.name: Refined Cuts
description: You have a global chance to cause enemies to bleed per stack of {Rhythm}.

dacn33-26.name: Art of Blades
description: Your critical strikes deal more damage per stack of {Rhythm}.

dacn33-27.name: Perfect Choreography
description: Each stack of {Rhythm} also grants 5% global more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but Dancing Strikes cost more mana.
reminderText: This is additive with Rhythm's baseline global more damage, but multiplicative with all other modifiers.

dacn33-28.name: Sophisticated Stabs
description: Dancing Strikes' first attack shreds enemy armor.

dacn33-29.name: Shadow Steps
description: Dancing Strikes' second attack creates a {Shadow}, but Dancing Strikes costs more mana.
reminderText:
Shadows will repeat one skill you use before vanishing. Shadows can repeat Acid Flask, Shurikens or Shadow Cascade, and their damage scales with your damage stats. 

You can have 3 Shadows at once, and they will disappear after 5 seconds.

dacn33-30.name: Deadly Waltz
description: Dancing Strikes shreds enemy physical resistance.

dacn33-31.name: Rupture
description: Your next {Puncture} deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) after using Dancing Strikes.

dacn33-32.name: Hidden Blade
description: Dancing Strikes' first attack has a chance to also attack with {Shadow Cascade}.

dagg3-0.name: Shadow Cascade
description:
Requires dual wielding.

A circular attack that's also used by your  {Shadows}.

dagg3-2.name: Shadow Torrent
description: Shadow Cascade deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per active {Shadow}.

dagg3-3.name: Battle Trance
description: You have a higher chance to dodge while directly using Shadow Cascade (multiplicative with other modifiers).

dagg3-4.name: Incapacitate
description: Shadow Cascade has a chance to apply {Frailty} to enemies hit, causing them to deal less damage.

dagg3-5.name: Shadow Flourish
description:
If you hit at least 4 enemies with Shadow Cascade, you deal increased physical damage for a short duration.

This effect can be triggered by daggers from {Dagger Dance} as well.

dagg3-6.name: Maiming
description: Shadow Cascade slows enemies for a short duration.

dagg3-7.name: Rending
description: Shadow Cascade has a chance to cause enemies to bleed.

dagg3-8.name: Toxic Whirl
description: Bleed chance from all sources is converted to poison when using Shadow Cascade.

dagg3-9.name: Rapid Expanse
description: Shadow Cascade deals damage in a larger area.

dagg3-10.name: Leveraged Momentum
description: Shadow Cascade deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per 1% of increased melee attack speed you have.

dagg3-11.name: Blade Rush
stats: 15% More Melee Crit Chance vs Bleeding
15% More Melee Crit Chance vs Poisoned
description: Shadow Cascade has more melee critical strike chance (multiplicative with other modifiers) against bleeding and poisoned enemies.

dagg3-12.name: Precision
description: Improves Shadow Cascade's base critical strike chance.

dagg3-13.name: Carnage
description: Shadow Cascade's critical strikes deal more damage.

dagg3-14.name: Gloomstalker
description: Shadow Cascade has a chance to create a {Shadow} on kill.

dagg3-15.name: Fight In The Shadows
description: You gain mana on use with Shadow Cascade per active {Shadow}.

dagg3-16.name: Onslaught
description: A portion of Shadow Cascade's mana cost is refunded if used when you have at least one {Shadow}

dagg3-17.name: Dismantle
description: Shadow Cascade has a chance to shred enemy armor.

dagg3-18.name: Excecution
description: Shadow Cascade deals more melee damage to enemies on low health (multiplicative with other modifiers).
reminderText: Targets below 35% max health are considered to be at low health.

dagg3-19.name: Careful Assault
description: Shadow Cascade deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) if you have a specific number of {Shadows}.

dagg3-20.name: Crushing Darkness
description: Shadow Cascade deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but no longer scales with attack speed.

dagg3-21.name: Dagger Dance
description: Shadow Cascade now also throws piercing daggers at nearby targets, dealing throwing physical damage.

dagg3-22.name: Daggerflow
description: Daggers from {Dagger Dance} last longer causing them to travel further.

dagg3-23.name: Fray
description: Daggers from {Dagger Dance} have a chance to cause enemies to bleed.

dagg3-24.name: Porcupine's Wrath
description: {Dagger Dance} throws more daggers which deal significantly more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but Shadow Cascade no longer includes a melee attack.

dagg3-25.name: Hurricane of Blades
description: Shadow Cascade is now channeled and throws daggers 3 times a second. It rapidly drains your mana.

dagg3-26.name: Shadow Elegance
stats: 20% Shadow Dagger Chance from Shadow Casts
100% Shadow Dagger Chance from Other Casts
description: Daggers from {Dagger Dance} inflict enemies with {Shadow Dagger}. This chance is much lower when {Dagger Dance} is used by a {Shadow}.

dagg3-27.name: Flow State
description: Shadow Cascade deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per sword or dagger you are wielding.

dagg3-28.name: Shadow Step
description:
When you directly use Shadow Cascade while targeting a {Shadow} you swap places with the Shadow.

This effect consumes mana based on how many times you have swapped places with a Shadow in the past 5 seconds.
reminderText:
This effect does not occur if the target shadow is in an inaccessible location.

If you have not swapped place with a Shadow in the past 5 seconds, this effect consumes no mana.

db992-2.name: Rush of the Hunt
description: Dive Bomb has a shorter cooldown.

db992-3.name: United Assault
description: You reduce a portion of Dive Bomb's remaining cooldown when you use a throwing or bow attack and hit at least one enemy.

db992-4.name: Featherfall
description:
Before your Falcon dives it now uses {Featherfall} that causes razor-sharp feathers to strike a number of enemies in an area around the target location.

{Shadow Falcons} won't use {Featherfall}.

db992-6.name: Hindering Beak Strike
description: Dive Bomb's hits slows enemies and it deals damage in a larger area.

db992-7.name: Expose their Defenses
description: Dive Bomb's hits apply {Critical Vulnerability} on enemies.

db992-8.name: Talon Blades
description:
Dive Bomb and {Featherfall} hits grant you a stack of {Talon Blades} for 18 seconds.

You have increased critical strike chance and critical multiplier per stack.

All stacks of {Talon Blades} are lost if you directly use Dive Bomb again.

db992-9.name: Gale of Blades
description: You move faster while you have at least 5 stacks of {Talon Blades}.

db992-10.name: Explosive Dive
stats: Explosive Traps Detonate From Dive Bomb
description:
If Dive Bomb hits your {Explosive Traps} they instantly explode dealing more damage in a larger area (both multiplicative with other modifiers).

Additionally, when you detonate an {Explosive Trap} this way you gain a stack of {Talon Blades}.

db992-11.name: Flesh Tearing Talons
description: Dive Bomb's hits shred enemy physical resistance.

db992-12.name: Red Wings
description: Dive Bomb's hits grant you a stack of {Crimson Shroud} per enemy hit, up to a maximum.

db992-13.name: Exsanguinating Strike
description:
Dive Bomb's hits deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per stack of bleed on the target up to a maximum.

Additionally, it causes all bleed stacks inflicted by you or your Falcon to be consumed to deal their remaining damage instantly.

db992-14.name: Rushing Wings
description: Dive Bomb deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and it has a shorter delay before the Falcon dives.

db992-15.name: Devastating Dive
description: Dive Bomb deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and stuns caused by it last longer, but it has a longer cooldown.

db992-18.name: On Wings of Shadow
description:
Dive Bomb now creates a {Shadow Falcon} to strike the location of your own {Shadows} and it will prioritize your {Shadows} nearest the target location, but {Shadow Falcons} deal less damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) than the real Falcon.

The number of {Shadow Falcons} cannot exceed the number of {Shadows} you currently have.
reminderText: Increases to your own {Shadow} damage also apply to your {Shadow Falcons}.

db992-19.name: Flock of Crows
stats: +34# Dusk Shroud Chance From Shadow Falcons
description: You have a chance to gain a stack of {Dusk Shroud} for each {Shadow Falcon} that hit at least one enemy.

db992-20.name: Birds Aren't Real
description:
A {Shadow Falcon} takes your Falcon's place, that uses Dive Bomb. Your Falcon is able to attack and use other abilities during this.
If you do not have an active Falcon, Dive Bomb will scale with your stats instead.

db992-21.name: Dancing Shadows
stats: 50% Shadow Falcons Chance To Dive Again
description: Your {Shadow Falcons} that land inside the area of your {Smoke Bomb} have a chance to take off again after a short delay before diving again at a nearby enemy to deal damage around them.

db992-22.name: Midnight Aviary
stats: +1% Shadow Falcon Damage Per Umbral Blade
+25% Max More Damage From Umbral Blades
description: Your {Shadow Falcons} deal more damage (multiplicative with other modfiers) per {Umbral Blade} you have on the ground, up to a maximum.
reminderText: This effect does not include Umbral Blades in flight, but it does include Blade Storms and Umbral blade waiting to explode.

db992-23.name: Valkyrie
description:
If you are wielding a spear you also leap to the target location when you use Dive Bomb. This deals damage in the area around the target.

Dive Bomb gains the {Traversal} tag.

db992-24.name: Rending Impact
description: Dive Bomb's hits cause enemies to bleed.

db992-25.name: Talon Knives
description: If you are dual wielding, a portion of the damage specific stats from both of your weapons apply to your Falcon's Dive Bomb.
reminderText: This doesn't include unique effects.

db992-26.name: Gaping Wounds
stats: +1% Ailment Damage Per 10% Increased Stun Chance
description: Dive Bomb deals more damage over time (multiplicative with other modifiers) per 10% of your increased stun chance.

db992-27.name: Rapid Pursuit
stats: 3 Mana Gain On Boss Or Rare Hit
description: If Dive Bomb hits at least one boss or rare enemy you regain mana and recover a portion of your remaining traversal skills' cooldown.

db992-28.name: Incendiary Collision Bird Missile
description:
If Dive Bomb hits one of your {Decoy}, it detonates it, causing its explosion to deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) in a larger area.

The effects from the {Rapid Pursuit} node are also gained when Dive Bomb hits one of your {Decoys}.

Dive Bomb cannot explode more than one {Decoy} per use.

db992-29.name: Focused Hunter
description: Dive Bomb deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and costs less mana.

db992-30.name: Cloud Gatherer
description:
If your Falcon lands inside the area of your {Smoke Bomb} the smoke area lasts longer.

This effect can occur once per Smoke Bomb.

db992-32.name: To Shreds
description: {Featherfall's} hits shred enemy armor.

deeco-0.name: Decoy
description: Summon a decoy.

deeco-1.name: Boom
description: Decoy's final explosion deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and explodes in a larger area.

deeco-2.name: Excessive Explosives
description: All explosions from Decoy deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

deeco-3.name: Explosive Charges
description: Decoy has a chance to cause a small explosion when hit, up to a maximum of 2 explosions.

deeco-4.name: Frostfire Powder
description:
All explosions' base fire damage is converted to cold. Consequently this damage scales with increases to cold damage, but not increases to fire damage. Explosions also gain a base freeze rate.

Ignite chance from all sources is converted to chill chance and effects related to ignite now depend on chill instead.

deeco-5.name: Remote Detonator
description:
Decoy becomes a combo ability. The first cast creates the decoy, and the second detonates it. The remote detonation costs mana.

Has no effect if Decoy has additional charges.

deeco-6.name: Rewired Detonator
description: Detonation costs less mana.

deeco-7.name: Freezing Blast
description: All explosions have a higher chance to freeze enemies.

deeco-8.name: Stuffed
description: Decoy can cause additional small explosions.

deeco-9.name: Lasting Presence
description: Decoy lasts longer, but has a longer cooldown.

deeco-10.name: Embedded Spikes
description: Decoy reflects a percentage of damage to attackers.

deeco-11.name: Into the Shadows
description: You have additional dodge chance while the decoy exists.

deeco-12.name: Ambush
description: When the decoy expires, for the next 4 seconds you have additional critical strike multiplier equal to your dodge chance while the decoy was active.

deeco-13.name: On Fire
description: The Decoy is on fire and ignites nearby enemies each second, but costs more mana.
reminderText: This is not affected by {Frostfire Powder}.

deeco-14.name: Kelthan Oil
description: The Decoy has increased ignite frequency.

deeco-15.name: Acid Fumes
description:
Small explosions are replaced by Acid Flask detonations. The final explosion is replaced by three Acid Flasks ejected from the decoy.
{On Fire} now inflicts poison instead of ignite.
reminderText: Acid Flasks cannot have extra projectiles when ejected from the Decoy.

deeco-16.name: Backup Buddy
description: Decoy can store an additional charge.

deeco-18.name: Efficient Construction
description: Decoy costs less mana.

deeco-19.name: Sonic Detonation
description: The Decoy emits a {Sonic Wave} when it appears, inflicting {Frailty} and armor shred to nearby enemies.

deeco-20.name: Warning Sound
description: {Sonic Wave} grants {Haste} to you and your allies hit for a duration.

deeco-21.name: Ear Shatter
description: {Sonic Wave} inflicts additional stacks of armor shred, and armor shred it applies lasts longer.

deeco-22.name: Harrowing Noise
description: {Sonic Wave} Fears enemies for a duration.
reminderText: Fear causes enemies to flee from you and your allies. Enemies can only be affected by Fear once.

deeco-23.name: Sound of Flames
description:
{Sonic Wave} inflicts fire resistance shred instead of armour shred.

If you have taken {Frostfire Powder} it instead inflicts cold resistance shred.

deeco-24.name: Short Fuse
description: Decoy's final explosion deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but Decoy has a shorter duration.

deeco-25.name: Shrouded Core
description: Decoy leaves a {Shadow} in its place after detonating.

deeco-26.name: Burning Oil
description: Decoy's final explosion ignites enemies.

deeco-27.name: Meticulous Construction
description: Decoy's final explosion deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but costs more mana.

deeco-28.name: Grand Diversion
description: Throw additional Decoys near the target location. Decoy location is slightly randomised.

detar-0.name: Detonating Arrow
description:
Requires a bow.

Fires an arrow that attatches itself in a target then explodes after 0.6 seconds. Added bow damage is converted to lightning damage.

detar-2.name: Quick Detonation
description: Detonating Arrow has increased critical strike chance and it has reduced arming time.

detar-3.name: Weak Spot
description: Detonating Arrow critical strikes deal more damage and it has a chance to apply {Critical Vulnerability} to enemies, making them easier to critically strike.

detar-4.name: Barrage
description: Detonating Arrow now explodes on impact in a cone behind the target rather than a circle, but no longer has an arming time.

detar-5.name: Dragon Arrow
description:
The explosion base lightning damage is converted to fire. Consequently this damage scales with increases to fire damage, but not increases to lightning damage.

Shock chance from all sources is converted to ignite chance and effects related to shock now depend on ignite instead.

Swaps Detonating Arrow's {Lightning} tag for a {Fire} tag.

detar-6.name: Outburst
description: The explosion deals damage in a larger area.

detar-7.name: Jolting Charge
description: Detonating Arrow has a chance to shock enemies, but the explosion hit deals less hit damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

detar-8.name: Infused Discharge
description: Detonating Arrow consumes a portion of your current mana to deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) equal to the mana consumed.
reminderText: As an example, if your current mana is 50 and you consume 10%, Detonating Arrow will deal 5% more damage.

detar-9.name: Well Crafted
description: The explosion deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) in a larger area.

detar-10.name: Thundersteel Arrow
description: Detonating Arrow now has a cooldown, but when you directly use it, it deals more damage in a significantly larger area (both multiplicative with other modifiers), and has an increased chance to stun.

detar-11.name: Loaded Quiver
description: You can store an additional charge of Detonating Arrow.

detar-12.name: Rapid Detonation
description: If an enemy has an attached Detonating Arrow and gets hit again, it explodes the first arrow immediately.

detar-13.name: Frostfang Arrow
description:
Detonating Arrow's base lightning damage is converted to cold. Consequently this damage scales with increases to cold damage, but not increases to lightning damage. It also gains a base freeze rate.

Shock chance from all sources is converted to chill chance.

Swaps Detonating Arrow's {Lightning} tag for a {Cold} tag. 

This has no effect if Detonating Arrow is converted to fire with {Dragon Arrow}.

detar-14.name: Frozen Resonance
description: Detonating Arrow has a higher chance based on your uncapped Cold Resistance.

detar-15.name: Arrow of Delay
description: Detonating Arrow causes enemies to have less movement speed (multiplicative with other modifiers) for each arrow attached.

detar-16.name: Delayed Detonation
description: Detonating Arrow has a longer arming time (multiplicative with other modifiers).

detar-17.name: Beastslayer Arrow
description: Detonating Arrow deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and has a longer arming time. The explosion deals more hit damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per second the arrow spent arming.

detar-18.name: Copper Dust Arrow
description: Detonating Arrow causes enemies to have less elemental resistance while they have at least 1 arrow attached.

detar-19.name: Lethal Blast
stats: +1% Explosion Hit Damage per 5% Missing Health
description: The explosion hit deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per 5% health the enemy is missing.

detar-20.name: Concentration
description: The explosion deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but in a smaller area (multiplicative with other modifiers).

detar-21.name: Aimed Shot
description: Detonating Arrow can now be charged up for up to 2 seconds, causing it to pierce a number of enemies (continue through targets it hits) per 0.5 seconds charged up.

detar-22.name: Pinpoint
description: Detonating Arrow deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per second charged up.

detar-23.name: Shock Arrow
description: Detonating Arrow has a chance to shock enemies.

detar-24.name: Navigator's Shot
description: Detonating Arrow now slightly seeks out targets.

detar-26.name: Suckerpunch Arrow
description:
When you hit an enemy with Detonating Arrow that already has an arrow attached to them, the explosion deals more damage in a larger area (multiplicative with other modifiers). 

{Suckerpunch Arrow} will not attach an additional Detonating Arrow.
reminderText: If Detonating Arrow's arming time is removed, this effect cannot occur.

detar-27.name: Fastshot
description: Detonating Arrow has increased attack speed and shock applied by this skill last longer.

detar-28.name: Arcing Blast
description:
The explosion causes {Lightning Tendrils} to chain out to other nearby targets. This can't hit enemies hit by the explosion.

This has no effect if Detonating Arrow's damage is converted.
reminderText: {Lightning Tendrils} scales with increases to lightning and bow damage.

detar-29.name: Piercing Thunder
description: {Lightning Tendrils} penetrate a portion of enemy lightning resistance and have a chance to shock enemies.

detar-30.name: Scorpion Arrow
description:
The explosion now poisons enemies on hit, but its hits deal less damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

Detonating Arrow's base damage is convered to Physical. Consequently this damage scales with increases to physical damage, but not increases to lightning damage.

Shock chance from all sources is converted to poison chance.

Swaps Detonating Arrow's {Lightning} tag for {Poison} and {Physical} tags.

This has no effect if Detonating Arrow is converted to fire or cold with {Dragon Arrow} or {Frostfang Arrow}.

detar-32.name: Mana Arrow
description: Detonating arrow no longer costs mana and instead restores mana when you directly use it and hit at least one enemy. However it now only has a small chance of exploding.
reminderText: Have no effect on mana consumed by effects such as the {Infused Discharge} node on the this tree.

detar-34.name: Deadly Ailments
description: Ailments inflicted by Detonating Arrow deal more damage over time (multiplicative with other modifiers).

dqv5-0.name: Dark Quiver
description:
Requires a bow.

Summons 7 {Black Arrows} which rain from the sky over 4 seconds, granting bonus damage to your next bow attack when retrieved.
reminderText: You cannot pick up a new {Black Arrow} until you've expended your current {Black Arrow}.

dqv5-2.name: Scourge Quiver
description: Using a {Black Arrow} grants increased damage over time to your next bow attack.

dqv5-3.name: Crimson Quiver
notScalingStats: -5% Damage Over Time Taken per Crimson Shroud
description: Picking up a {Black Arrow} grants you a stack of {Crimson Shroud} for a short duration, granting you bleed chance and less damage over time taken. This stacks up to 3 times for a short duration.

dqv5-4.name: Rending Shots
description: Using a {Black Arrow} grants a chance to shred enemy physical resistance to your next bow attack.

dqv5-5.name: Mending
description: Picking up a {Black Arrow} restores health.

dqv5-6.name: Nightfall
description: Picking up a {Black Arrow} grants you a stack of {Dusk Shroud} for 4 seconds, granting you glancing blow chance and dodge rating. This effect can stack.

dqv5-7.name: Arrow of the Trickster
description: Picking up a {Black Arrow} creates a {Shadow} at the arrow's location.
reminderText:
Shadows will repeat one skill you use before vanishing. Shadows can repeat Acid Flask, Shurikens or Shadow Cascade, and their damage scales with your damage stats. 

You can have 3 Shadows at once, and they will disappear after 5 seconds.

dqv5-8.name: Quick Draw
description: Picking up a {Black Arrow} grants you the Frenzy buff, granting you 20% increased attack and cast speed for a short duration.

dqv5-9.name: Heavy Arrows
description: Using a {Black Arrow} grants additional physical damage to your next bow attack.

dqv5-10.name: Heartseeker
description: Using a {Black Arrow} grants increased critical strike chance to your next bow attack.

dqv5-11.name: Trueshot
description: Using a {Black Arrow} causes your next {Multishot} to pierce additional enemies (continue through targets they hit).

dqv5-12.name: Fatal Barrage
description: Using a {Black Arrow} improves your next {Flurry's} base critical strike chance.

dqv5-13.name: Archer's Focus
description: Using a {Black Arrow} grants more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) to your next bow attack, but consume additional mana.

dqv5-14.name: Fiery Vengeance
description: Picking up a {Black Arrow} resets the combo of {Cinder Strike}.

dqv5-15.name: Dragon Slayer
description: Using a {Black Arrow} causes your next {Cinder Strike} to instantly kill enemies that are below a health threshold (a percentage of their maximum health).
reminderText: If you have a similar effect from an item or passive node then the highest threshold is used.

dqv5-16.name: Resolve
description: Picking up a {Black Arrow} restores mana.

dqv5-17.name: Umbral Resolution
description:
Using a {Black Arrow} consumes all active {Shadows} to grant your next bow attack more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per {Shadow} consumed.

Consuming at least 3 {Shadows} grants significantly more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

dqv5-18.name: Lacerating Arrows
description: Using a {Black Arrow} grants {Puncture} additional physical penetration and bleed chance.

dqv5-19.name: Toxic Quiver
description: Using a {Black Arrow} grants additional poison penetration and poison chance to your next bow attack.

dqv5-20.name: Large Quiver
description: Additional {Black Arrows} are summoned, but the arrows are summoned at the same frequency causing {Dark Quiver} to have a longer duration.

dqv5-21.name: Nature's Focus
description: Using a {Black Arrow} grants increased elemental damage to your next bow attack.

dqv5-22.name: Elemental Adept
description: Using a {Black Arrow} grants a chance to freeze, shock or ignite enemies, depending on the element, to your next bow elemental attack.

dqv5-23.name: Grand Detonation
description: Using a {Black Arrow} causes your next {Detonating Arrow} to deal damage in a significantly larger area.

dqv5-24.name: Crippling Arrows
description: Picking up a {Black Arrow} slows nearby enemies for a short duration.

dqv5-25.name: Fend Off
description: Picking up a {Black Arrow} knocks nearby enemies back 4 meters.

dqv5-26.name: Accessible
description: {Black Arrows} are summoned more frequently. This does not cause more arrows to be summoned and also causes {Dark Quiver} to have a shorter duration.

dqv5-27.name: Quickened Arrows
description: You instantly summon a number of {Black Arrows} on use. The rest are spread out over the normal duration.
reminderText: This does not increase the total number of Black Arrows summoned.

dqv5-28.name: Until Dawn
stats: 5% Arrow On Bow Skill Use Chance
description: Using a bow attack grants you a chance to summon a {Black Arrow} at a random nearby location. This effect has a 3 second cooldown.

dqv5-29.name: Tide of Darkness
description: Using a {Black Arrow} causes your next {Hail of Arrows} to deal increased damage over time equal to twice your critical strike chance.

dqv5-30.name: Perfect Bolts
description:
Picking up a {Black Arrow} grants active {Ballistae} additional bow physical damage while they are alive.

This effect stacks up to 4 times.

dqv5-31.name: Keen Shots
description:
Picking up a {Black Arrow} grants active {Ballistae} increased attack speed while they are alive.

This effect stacks up to 4 times.

dqv5-32.name: Heavy Artillery
description: {Ballistae} that have been buffed by at least 4 {Black Arrows} always critically strike.

dqv5-34.name: Bleak Arrow
description: Using a Black Arrow grants your next {Heartseeker} additional {Recurve} chance.

ex4tp-2.name: Ash Compartment
description: Explosive Trap deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and its hits shred enemy fire resistance.

ex4tp-3.name: Hold This
description:
Whenever you hit an enemy with any melee attack, you attach an Explosive Trap to that enemy.

This effect has a 1.5 second cooldown and attached traps explode after 1 second ignoring arming time or when the enemy it's attached to dies. Enemies cannot have more than 1 trap attached.

ex4tp-4.name: Aspect of the Rabbit
description:
Attached traps deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

If the enemy that the Explosive Trap is attached to hits you, it now attaches to you instead (but will still only damage enemies). Hitting an enemy then attaches it back to them without changing the delay before exploding.

Additionally, when it explodes, the trap deals 30% more damage for each time it has been passed.

ex4tp-5.name: Arrow Traps
description:
When an Explosive Trap detonates, all other Explosive Traps now also detonate in quick succession and fire {Detonating Arrows} at the original target trap's location. The Detonating Arrows can occur a limited number of times per 2 seconds.

This effect consumes mana equal to a portion of your {Detonating Arrow's} mana cost.
reminderText: This effect only works while you have positive mana. Exceeding the limit only prevents Detonating Arrows, it does not prevent the chain detonations.

ex4tp-6.name: Blasting Device
description: {Detonating Arrows} fired this way deal additional bow damage per 3 Dexterity.

ex4tp-7.name: Static Mines
description:
Explosive Trap's base fire damage is converted to lightning. Consequently this damage scales with increases to lightning damage, but not increases to fire damage.

Fire resistance shred chance from all sources is converted to lightning resistance shred.

Swaps Explosive Trap's {Fire} tag for a {Lightning} tag.

ex4tp-8.name: Lightning Bomb
description: Explosive Trap's hits have a chance to shock enemies and inflict them with a {Spark Charge}.

ex4tp-9.name: Trapas
description:
When directly using Explosive Trap, an unconverted Explosive Trap and a trap corresponding to each conversion node you have taken are thrown at the same time. Traps thrown this way are thrown in a small area.

Additionally, Explosive Trap deals less damage in a smaller area (both multiplicative with other modifiers) and cost additional mana.

ex4tp-10.name: Coldsnap Mines
description:
Explosive Trap's base fire damage is converted to cold. Consequently this damage scales with increases to cold damage, but not increases to fire damage.

Fire resistance shred chance from all sources is converted to cold resistance shred.

Swaps Explosive Trap's {Fire} tag for a {Cold} tag.
reminderText: This effect conversion takes priority if you have converted Explosive Trap to lightning.

ex4tp-11.name: Flash Frozen
description:
Explosive Trap's hits have a chance to chill enemies.

Additionally, Explosive Trap has additional freeze rate per Intelligence.

ex4tp-12.name: Freezing Trap
description:
When you directly throw Explosive Trap, its hits always freeze enemies, but it now has a cooldown.

Whenever you freeze an enemy with any skill, a portion of Explosive Trap's remaining cooldown is recovered.
reminderText: If Explosive Trap already has a cooldown, the highest cooldown is used.

ex4tp-13.name: Tinkerer's Design
description: Explosive Trap is now triggered from farther away and deals damage in a larger area.

ex4tp-14.name: Adaptive Fuse
description:
Particularly fast enemies (with a movement speed above 6 meters per second) trigger Explosive Traps instantly, even if they haven't armed.

Additionally, Explosive Trap's hits deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) to moving enemies.
reminderText: Base player movement speed is 5.28 meters per second.

ex4tp-15.name: Prepared Demolition
description: Explosive Trap deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) in a larger area for each second it has existed before detonating up to a maximum.

ex4tp-16.name: Gadgeteer
description: Explosive Trap deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifeirs) if the arming time is not ignored, but it takes longer for it to arm before it can detonate.

ex4tp-17.name: Smoke Traps
stats: 30% Dusk Shroud chance gained per second
description: When an Explosive Trap detonates, if it hit at least one enemy, it has a chance to grant you a stack of {Dusk Shroud}. This chance increases for each second it spends arming.
reminderText: The chance has no benefit when above 100%.

ex4tp-18.name: Umbral Saboteur
description: Explosive Trap deals additional throwing damage per stack of {Dusk Shroud} you have.

ex4tp-19.name: Jelkhor's Blueprint
description: Explosive Trap costs less mana and it has increased throwing attack speed.

ex4tp-20.name: Sky Signal
description:
Whenever one of your Explosive Traps detonate, your {Falcon} gains physical and elemental penetration for a short duration.

This effect can trigger up to a maximum of 15 times within 3 seconds.

ex4tp-21.name: Free Lofting Bird
description: Whenever one of your Explosive Traps detonate, your {Falcon's} skills recover a portion of their remaining cooldowns.

ex4tp-22.name: No Man's Land
description:
Whenever you directly throw Explosive Trap, you now throw traps, up to your maximum number of traps, in a wide area around the target location.

Explosive Trap deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per maximum traps, but it now has a cooldown and costs more mana per maximum trap.
reminderText:
"Per maximum trap" bonuses do take your base 5 maximum traps into account, as well as ones added by nodes and items.

If Explosive Trap already has a cooldown, the highest cooldown is used.

ex4tp-23.name: Minefield
description: You can now have more active Explosive Traps.

ex4tp-24.name: Clustered Explosives
description: You now throw additional Explosive Traps per use, but Explosive Trap costs more mana.

ex4tp-25.name: Subtle Sabotage
description: Explosive Trap costs less mana, but deals less damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) in a smaller area.

ex4tp-26.name: Blast Rain
description:
You now shoot arrows attached with Explosive Traps up into the air that then drop down around the target location.

Explosive Trap now scales with your bow damage instead of throwing damage and your bow attack speed instead of throwing attack speed.

This requires wielding a bow.

ex4tp-27.name: Impact Trigger
description:
Explosive Traps now instantly detonate when the arrows hit the ground via the {Blast Rain} node, ignoring the arming time.

Additionally, Explosive Trap has a higher chance to stun enemies.

ex4tp-28.name: Trap Sprinkler
description: Whenever an Explosive Trap detonates, it has a chance to drop a fresh Explosive Trap at its location as long as there is an enemy within 6 meters, but Explosive Trap costs more mana.

ex4tp-29.name: Automated Bombardment
description:
Explosive Trap has an additional chance to drop a fresh Explosive Trap via the {Trap Sprinkler} node, but Explosive Trap costs more mana.

Traps dropped this way cannot drop more additional traps.

ex4tp-30.name: Siege Engineering
description:
Whenever an Explosive Trap detonates, it now has a chance to create a {Ballista} for you.

This consumes mana equal to a portion of {Ballista's} mana cost.

ex4tp-31.name: Trapuchet
description:
Explosive Traps dropped by the {Trap Sprinkler} node are now flung at a nearby enemy within 12 meters instead of being dropped.

Explosive Traps dropped by the {Trap Sprinkler} node can now drop Explosive Traps when there's an enemy within 12 meters even if there is not an enemy within 6 meters.

ex4tp-32.name: Instrument of the Alchemist
description:
When an Explosive Trap drops a trap by the {Trap Sprinkler} node, it also flings an {Acid Flask} for you towards the target location.

This consumes mana equal to a portion of Acid Flask's mana cost.

exvol8-2.name: Volley
description: Hail of Arrows deals damage in a larger area

exvol8-3.name: Blot Out the Sun
description: You have a chance to gain a stack of {Dusk Shroud} each second for 2 seconds while inside the area, granting you glancing blow chance and dodge rating. This effect can stack.

exvol8-4.name: Fight in the Shade
description: Hail of Arrows now also grants a stack of {Dusk Shroud} to allies each second for 2 seconds while inside the area.

exvol8-5.name: Skystrike
description: Hail of Arrows now also shoots a {Barrage of Arrows} on use dealing bow physical damage, but costs more mana. This does not scale with damage over time.

exvol8-6.name: Silver Arrows
description: Improves {Barrage of Arrows'} base critical strike chance.

exvol8-7.name: Condemn
description: {Barrage of Arrows} immobilizes enemies for a short duration. Rare enemies and bosses are slowed instead.

exvol8-8.name: Blighted Arrows
description: Hail of Arrows has a chance to apply {Frailty} to enemies each second.

exvol8-9.name: Sundering Rain
description: Hail of Arrows has a chance to shred enemy armour each second.

exvol8-10.name: Lethality
description: Hail of Arrows has a chance to inflict enemies with {Crit Vulnerability} each second.

exvol8-11.name: Arsonist
description: Hail of Arrows deals more bow damage to ignited enemies (multiplicative with other modifiers).

exvol8-12.name: Scorched Earth
description:
Hail of Arrows' base physical damage is converted to fire. Consequently this damage scales with increases to fire damage, but not increases to physical damage.

Bleed chance from all sources is converted to ignite chance and effects related to bleed now depend on ignite instead.

Swaps Hail of Arrows' {Physical} tag for a {Fire} tag.

This has no effect if Hail of Arrows is converted to cold with {Crystal Arrows} or to poison with {Acid Rain}.

exvol8-13.name: Pristine Fletcher
description: Hail of Arrows deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but in a smaller area (multiplicative with other modifiers).

exvol8-14.name: Soul Stealer Arrows
description: Hail of Arrows leeches a portion of the bow damage it deals as health.

exvol8-16.name: Focus
description: Hail of Arrows deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

exvol8-17.name: Quick Draw
description: Hail of Arrows costs less mana, but has a shorter duration (multiplicative with other modifiers).

exvol8-18.name: Backup Volley
description: You can store additional charges of Hail of Arrows, but it has a shorter duration (multiplicative with other modifiers).

exvol8-19.name: Deadly Draw
description: Hail of Arrows costs less mana and has a shorter cooldown, but has a longer delay before the arrows fall.

exvol8-20.name: Tear Flesh
description: Hail of Arrows has a chance to cause enemies to bleed each second.

exvol8-21.name: Aim for the Heart
description: Hail of Arrows deals more bow damage per stack of bleed on the enemy, up to a maximum. This does not affect ailment damage.

exvol8-22.name: Arrow Spray
description: Hail of Arrows now fall in a forward advancing rectangle area rather than a circle.

exvol8-23.name: Pin Down
description: Hail of Arrows has a chance to slow enemies each second.

exvol8-24.name: Crystal Arrows
description:
